recommendations: Antra Saxena “Miraj got in touch with me while he was recruiting for a leading fund. Although the opportunity did not pan out for me I liked working with him. 1. He is proactive - during the two processes that he ran for me, I could rely on him to relay timely feedback, schedule interviews etc 2. He also kept flagging relevant opportunities to me that ultimately helped me land my dream job I would highly recommend Miraj!”

Arpita Gujrati “Miraj helped me to get placed at my first private equity job, post a stint at a domestic IB firm. He patiently ensured all my queries were answered before on-boarding. He and the team ensures that the requests are seamlessly fulfilled at both ends.”
